channel.title: MangoH Red with Talon Communications bluetooth IoT card
channel.description: Hello all, I have got MangoH Red board and i'ld like to integrate Talon communications blue-tooth IoT cart. Can someone help me on this.

item.title: MangoH Red with Talon Communications bluetooth IoT card
item.dc:creator: mallikarjunareddy
item.description:
Hey nkau_tha,

   Thanks for you support.
   I've made changes in "meta-swi-extras/build" and blue-tooth is discoverable now in my mangoH red board. But i'm unable to pair/connect from my phone.

Thanks & Regards,
Mallikarjuna Reddy

Read full topic
item.source: MangoH Red with Talon Communications bluetooth IoT card

item.title: MangoH Red with Talon Communications bluetooth IoT card
item.dc:creator: nkau_tha
item.description:
I’ve downloaded “Legato-Dist-Source-mdm9x06-SWI9X06Y_02.18.05.00.tar.bz2” Yocto from https://source.sierrawireless.com/resources/airprime/software/wp77xx/wp77xx-firmware-latest-release-components/ (for my wp7702 component) but build.sh is not in legato directory but in the yocto directory under meta-swi.

Read full topic
item.source: MangoH Red with Talon Communications bluetooth IoT card

item.title: MangoH Red with Talon Communications bluetooth IoT card
item.dc:creator: mallikarjunareddy
item.description:
Hey nkau_tha,

      Thanks for support.
      I'm not able to find file "**_meta-swi/build.sh_**". Which version of Legato release are you using..?

Read full topic
item.source: MangoH Red with Talon Communications bluetooth IoT card

item.title: MangoH Red with Talon Communications bluetooth IoT card
item.dc:creator: nkau_tha
item.description:
Hi @mallikarjunareddy,

You can start reading what i’ve posted in the forum:

https://forum.mangoh.io/t/bluetooth-le-on-mangoh-red-with-iot-card/1960

There is a couple more information that I’ve finally found like modifying bt-init.sh by removing the mux command and replacing them by the ones quoted in this post:

https://forum.mangoh.io/t/error-when-starting-bluetooth-util/834

Good luck ! (it’s sometimes not easy to find to find information)

nkau

Read full topic
item.source: MangoH Red with Talon Communications bluetooth IoT card
